scripts.federalist: npm install --only=dev && npm run demo:docs && ng build --project=sam-design-system-site --prod --base-href=$BASEURL/ && npm run build:docs
scripts.changelog: gren changelog --override && git add . && git commit -m "Add changelog" && git push
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release-notes && npm run changelog
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release-notes && npm run changelog
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release-notes && npm run changelog
scripts.demo:docs:components: npx compodoc -p libs/packages/components/tsconfig.json -e json -d libs/documentation/src/lib/apidoc/components --minimal && node ./scripts/generate-docs.ts -f components
scripts.demo:docs:formly: npx compodoc -p libs/packages/sam-formly/tsconfig.json -e json -d libs/documentation/src/lib/apidoc/formly --minimal  && node ./scripts/generate-docs.ts -f formly
scripts.demo:docs:layouts: npx compodoc -p libs/packages/layouts/tsconfig.json -e json -d libs/documentation/src/lib/apidoc/layouts --minimal  && node ./scripts/generate-docs.ts -f layouts
scripts.demo:docs: npm run demo:docs:components && npm run demo:docs:formly && npm run demo:docs:layouts
scripts.build:docs:components: npx compodoc -p libs/packages/components/tsconfig.json -n "SAM.Gov Design System - Components" --hideGenerator --disableCoverage -d dist/apps/sam-design-system-site/compodoc/components
scripts.build:docs:formly: npx compodoc -p libs/packages/sam-formly/tsconfig.json -n "SAM.Gov Design System - Formly" --hideGenerator --disableCoverage -d dist/apps/sam-design-system-site/compodoc/formly
scripts.build:docs:layouts: npx compodoc -p libs/packages/layouts/tsconfig.json -n "SAM.Gov Design System - Layouts" --hideGenerator --disableCoverage -d dist/apps/sam-design-system-site/compodoc/layouts
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs:components && npm run build:docs:formly && npm run build:docs:layouts
scripts.postinstall: node ./decorate-angular-cli.js && ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main --first-only --create-ivy-entry-points
